msbt.message: If you don't mind my asking, darling, would you like to come to my house for a visit?
Sure!
Maybe next time.
Say, , would you want to come over to my house?I'd love to chat more, but I'd rather not do it while lollygagging about outside.
Sure!
Maybe next time.
Say, would you like to come over? I have a charming little home I'd LOVE to show off. And if you adore interior decorating like I do, well, we'll have SO much to talk about!
Sure!
Maybe next time.
Oh, I see Well, perhaps another time, then.
I'm so sorry. I suppose I should have asked whether you already had plans. I'll ask again some other time.
Oh my, that's a shame. Well, let's visit again when we have the chance. I'll be looking forward to it.
Marvelous! Now, let's see When would be a good time for you?
Let's go right now!
I'm free tomorrow.
Why, thank you! How wonderful! Now, the only question is when?
Why wait? Let's go!
I can do tomorrow.
That's just what I wanted to hear! Now, when would be a good time?
Right now works.
Let's say tomorrow.
Well then, let's go!
Well then, what are we waiting for? Let's be off!
Alrighty then, come with me!
Come to think of it, you've never been to my house before, have you, darling?
I've been dying to invite you over to see my house. I'm delighted the timing worked out!
Oh dear! Would you look at the time! It's too late for today. But not to worry, I'll ask again soon.
Lovely! That gives me time to pick up around the place. I'm looking forward to tomorrow.
Alrighty then, see you tomorrow!
Tomorrow is fab for me, my dear! Goodness, I can't wait!
Now, please do NOT forget. I don't take kindly to being stood up. Surely you understand, .
I'll be at home all day, so come by whenever is convenient for you, .
Don't come too late or you might just catch me dreaming. The earlier the better, .
Come to think of it, won't this be your first time visiting my house? I'm looking forward to this, indeed!
I do believe this will be your first visit to my home. You do know where it is, don't you, darling?Well, you've got a map. I'm sure you'll find your way!
I'm looking forward to seeing you tomorrow. Do come by anytime. I'll be waiting, !
, what time do you think you'll come by tomorrow?<10_4 /> Wait, no, don't tell me! I'd rather enjoy the anticipation! Where's the fun in knowing exactly when you'll arrive, ?
Tomorrow just can't come soon enough! I am positively beside myself in anticipation of your visit! My goodness, I do get rather excited about playing host, don't I?
Say, would you like to come by my house right now?Walking around outside is lovely and all, but I'd much rather we retire to my well-appointed home.
Sounds good to me!
I can't right now.

Goodness, ! I simply don't know what to do!You see, I'm planning a small soiree at my home, but I fear my hostessing skills are quite rusty. Hold that thought, darling! I have a fabulous idea! Why don't you come over and let me practice on you.
Yeah, sure.
I'm sorry, I can't.
Oh, that's alright. Perhaps another time. I know you're terribly busy, but do be sure to relax now and again.
Very sorry to spring that on you out of the blue, !And not to worry. I'll be fine. You know me I always rise to the occasion!
